title: WAS DOING A SERIES, LOST ONE GAME, LOST SERIES
body:
I was on my series, but was too tired to play the matches. I looked to see how many pts I advanced in my league, and noticed I jumped 40 spots.

But it said I was at 97 pts, when previously I had been at 96... and I was then in my promos.

Ok, so I do the first game of my series, lose it due to AFK (of which I'd had 40 in my last 100 matches), and it says I was unsuccessful and am at 76 pts.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/205184903

You can see I've only lost ONE of my last 7 matches, so there's no way I could have lost my series.

Please fix this, thanks.

replies.body: Queue dodges actually count as losses when you're in your promo series. After you won a match, your dodge counted as a loss, and your next loss kicked you out of your series. ):

Bump.

Why hasn't this been resolved already?

I lost a single match, and it took me out of my series.

It should take .5 seconds to look into this....
Did you dodge a game?  If so, your fault.
If you want an actual solution you should've sent a ticket instead of posting on the forums.
